file_content.text: Get out of here!
You. You're with the military? I heard the shots, but I wasn't sure.
I can't believe you actually followed us in here. None of us are going to make it back out--you know that, right?
I know you're one of the terrorists. Tell me what's happened.
Where's everyone else?
Heh. I'm one of the terrorists, all right. Like everyone you kill. That's why we decided to make a stand--to terrorize.
I'm the last one. A dozen of us came into the temple, and the rest are dead--or gone. Same with you, I guess.
You should've known you couldn't pull this off. What did you mean to accomplish?
What were you hoping for?
To show the Empire what it means to fight for freedom--and we still will.
You failed. There's no shame in that, but there's no sense in fighting, either.
You did well, but it's over.
It was a little different for me. I was sent on my own.
I didn't need anyone's help.
Right--and I've just been observing, awed by your amazing skill.
Impossible... you couldn't have come this far without massive help. Not that it matters.
I know you've failed at your mission to destroy the power conduits.
You're finished.
Don't question me, you piece of filth.
Shut up. [Hurt him]
Ahh! Heh. Heh....
You think you've done some great thing by tracking me down?
You can shoot me now. You can save the power grid, preserve the Imperial lifestyle for a little longer. But there are other cells. They'll keep fighting.
What "other cells" are you talking about?
Other cells?
Other cells, other planets. This attack was just the tip of the iceberg.
There's worse coming--but that's all you're going to learn.
Calm down, and I'll get you out of here.
Let's go.
You're not leaving. No one is. This place is death--don't you get that?
You can't stop me--you'll have to kill me. Shoot me now, Imperial, before the ghosts get into your head.
You don't care if the ghosts get into my head. You're worried they'll get into yours.
You're afraid of the temple.
Yes. Damn you. That's not how I want to go.
Listen--it doesn't have to happen like this.
Violence isn't necessary.
Yes. It does.
I saw what happened to my friends. I took comfort in the fact I'd die when we took out the power grid....
Have mercy. Kill me now, before the ghosts come.
I'll make it quick.
All right. [Kill him]
Thank--thank you....
Here--take this medpac. Patch yourself up and get out of here.
I can help you.
You're serious? Look, I... let me turn myself in! I'd rather face torture than the things down here.
When you get out, remember who saved your life. You owe us now.
I expect full cooperation.
I'll remember. I won't side with you, but I can show my gratitude.
Watch your back, and don't do anything stupid.
Just don't get killed.
I'm going to do my best.
Torture's the least you can look forward to. But there won't be any ghosts.
Then you're in luck.
I understand.
I plan to stay and watch the spirits get you. It's no worse than you deserve.
No mercy.
No. Please don't. I can feel it coming now....
Heh. Heh....
Consider it your last request.
If you insist. [Kill him]
No more. [Kill him]
You'll never make it out of here, Imperial.
Start walking--you're coming with me.
I won't let you die.
This won't work. I can feel something coming--it's taking over my head.
